name: Corona-Killer
description:
Have you ever wondered how does it feel like to be Coronavirus?  This game will put you in the shoes of coronavirus.

At some point(or from start itself), you might feel that the game is OutOfControlle but remember, Coronavirus is also OutOfControlle.

I was unable to add LeaderBoard feature in WebGL but if you want this game with LeaderBoard you can download the Standalone or android executable.

In-game instructions are provided but still, you can use A, D or the buttons provided to move.

Most of the 3D models were downloaded from https://sketchfab.com/ and the music was downloaded from https://www.bensound.com.
